indian.details: Free for 30 days. Must have hotel booking (Discover Qatar) + onward ticket.

activities.title: Souq Waqif
activities.description: Traditional market with spices, falcons, and authentic Qatari food. Best visited in evening.

activities.title: Museum of Islamic Art
activities.description: World-class art museum designed by I.M. Pei on its own island. Stunning skyline views.

activities.title: The Orchard (Indoor Garden)
activities.description: A massive tropical garden inside the terminal. Perfect for fresh air without immigration.

activities.title: Al Mourjan Business Lounge
activities.description: Massive 10,000sqm lounge. Showers, a la carte dining, and sleeping areas.

activities.title: Katara Cultural Village
activities.description: Amphitheater, mosques, and galleries. Great for photography.

activities.title: Oryx Airport Hotel
activities.description: Transit hotel inside the terminal. Book in advance for a proper bed.

activities.title: National Museum of Qatar
activities.description: Desert Rose architecture. Immersive history of Qatar.

activities.title: Vitality Wellbeing & Fitness
activities.description: Swimming pool, gym, and squash courts inside the airport hotel.
